fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.interfaces

Interface MessageI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardMessage

    public interface MessageI
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface MessageI declares the general method signatures for a message to be broadcast or transmitted over the ring overlay network.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       getURI() != null

    Created on : 2019-04-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
